reviews.review_msg: he's slightly creepy and pervy. i agree his lectures are pretty interesting with additional info but exams straight out of his notes. he loves his graphs! not to mention, stupid little details and not the big picture.
Love his lectures. Not a hard course. Lots of materials to know and memorize, but otherwise  clear. It was fun being in the class. I especially enjoyed 375, in class though.

Prof. Walsh is definitely concerned with memorizing details rather than learning concepts. I found his lecture syle engaging, but he didn't use the text at all, and all 4 (thats right, 3 midterms) exams came straight from his lecture notes. A photographic memory would really help you in this course.
OMG - kill me... he is the most anal teacher I ever had - he makes u memorize graphs and numbers that u would never think u need to know. Course is interesting but I didn't enjoy him very much :(
